title: Subjectively the movie of the year
review:
During certain scenes in the movie my heart was pounding so hard and breath was literally taken away. I didn't expect that intensity and masterful director's work, but even after 8 hours I am still contemplating the stuff seen.
Easily 10/10

title: So many questions left
review: But I believe President Trump is the ultimate weapon to defeat Pennywise with. He could come up with loads of insulting names for the clown and finish him up in like 5 mins.
